articles.author: Kara Fox, CNN
articles.title: America's mask mandate is gone -- for the fully vaccinated - CNN
articles.description: The CDC lifted the mask mandate for fully vaccinated Americans on Thursday. But with vaccine hesitancy and the idea of vaccine passports a contested issue, how America navigates the next stage of the pandemic remains unanswered.

articles.author: Steven Lee Myers
articles.title: China’s Ambitious Plans in Space: The Moon, Mars and Beyond - The New York Times
articles.description: An upcoming Mars landing is one of many high-profile missions on the country’s schedule as it seeks to challenge American dominance of space exploration.
articles.content: Chinas launch in April of the main module for its newest orbiting space station drew more international attention than expected for the wrong reasons. After reaching orbit, the main rocket booster tu… [+2313 chars]

articles.title: Biden calls lifting of indoor mask rule 'great day' - News24
articles.description: President Joe Biden told Americans on Thursday that the lifting of the rule on indoor mask wearing was "a great day" in the fight against Covid-19 and that they could now "smile again."
articles.content:

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Vaccinated Americans can go maskless in most places: CDC - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: ‘We have all longed for this moment,’ says the director of the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.
